content: About me - Bin Xu 许斌 Bin Xu Professor at Tsinghua University Follow Beijing, China Email (010)62771736 Google Scholar I am a professor in Department of Computer Science and Technology of Tsinghua University. I obtained my Ph.D., master and bachelor in Tsinghua University in 2006, 1998 and 1996 respectively. I am a member of Knowledge Engineering Group, working on exciting areas of artificial intelligence. I am very honored to work with Prof. Juanzi LI, Prof. Jie Tang, Prof. Yuxiao Dong, Prof. Lei Hou in the same research group. Research Interests Large Language Model, Knowledge Graph, Artificial Intelligence Address Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084. China PR.
